summary: Provides lightweight override utilities that mimic local and remote execution contexts for Metaflow, handling custom exception and class serialization/deserialization, simple attribute get/set, and print operations to emulate environment escape behavior during testing.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable testing of Metaflow's environment escape mechanism by supplying mock functions that replicate crossâ€‘environment interactions, ensuring proper handling of exceptions, class objects, and attribute access when code moves between local and remote runtimes.
